Package server

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    CloudStorage
    Cloud abstraction.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActivityManager
    Manages the data displayed in the activity view.
    Breadcrumb
    Manages breadcrumb data, for displaying the breadcrumb navigation in the MUBox folder view.
    ChangeManager
    Class for managing file operations in the database
    CloudFactory
    Cloud factory.
    Constants  
    Constants.DB  
    Constants.DB.Collection  
    Constants.DB.FileData  
    Constants.Provider  
    Debugging<T>  
    Debugging.Printer<T>  
    Dropbox
    Implementation of CloudStorage for Dropbox.
    DropboxAuthorizationManager
    Class that manages authorization for Dropbox
    FileInfo
    Represents information about a downloaded file.
    GoogleDrive
    CloudStorage implementation for Google Drive.
    MUBoxStart
    Main class that starts the server.
    ServerInfo
    Stores web server information: protocol (most likely HTTP), server name, port number.
    Settings
    Stores application settings: whether Activity View, shadow files, voting are enabled or disabled.
    VotingEvaluator
    Schedules a TimerTask thread to close time constraint votings periodically.
    VotingInfo
    Encapsulates the voting information to be inserted in the voting collection.
    VotingScheme
    Encapsulates voting scheme information.
